description:
AVG Internet Security provides comprehensive real-time protection against viruses, spyware, identity theft, poisoned web pages, and all types of malware that can threaten your valuable personal information.

#### Commercial trial version
This package installs a 30 day trial version of the commercial program AVG Internet Security.

#### Documentation
* [FAQ](https://support.avg.com/support_Internet_Security)
* [Policies](http://www.avg.com/policies)
* [Manual](http://www.avg.com/downloads-documentation)

summary: Comprehensive security and privacy protection for online users
author: AVG Technologies
